text: No action taken by the District of Columbia in connection with the rights afforded under this chapter shall operate to deny to the injured or diseased policeman or fireman recovery for any damages or portion thereof not covered by this chapter.
historical:
Prior Codifications

1981 Ed., § 4-507.

1973 Ed., § 4-1007.

Legislative History of Laws

For legislative history of D.C. Law 2-100, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 5-601.

DC CODE § 5-607

Current through December 11, 2012

title.text: Police, Firefighters, Medical Examiner, and Forensic Sciences. (Refs & Annos)

chapter.text: Police and Firefighters Medical Care Recovery.

heading.catch_text: Effect of chapter on other rights of recovery.
